SimpleDataListSpec.Name: UMHS Duplicate Search Match Set Simple Data List
SimpleDataListSpec.Description: A simple data list that returns MIMED duplicate search match set records
SimpleDataListSpec.Author: UM Dev

SPSimpleList.c:CreateProcedureSQL: create procedure dbo.USR_USP_SIMPLEDATALIST_UMHSDUPSEARCHMATCHSET as set nocount on; select top 20 d.MATCHSETID as VALUE, CONVERT(VARCHAR(20), d.DATEADDED, 100) as LABEL from USR_UMHS_DELETEDMATCHEDMIMEDCONTACTSTOUMAFFILIATIONS d inner join ( select ROW_NUMBER() over(PARTITION BY MATCHSETID ORDER BY DATEADDED) ROWNUM, MATCHSETID, DATEADDED from USR_UMHS_MATCHEDMIMEDCONTACTSTOUMAFFILIATIONS ) m on m.MATCHSETID=d.MATCHSETID where m.ROWNUM=1 order by d.DATEADDED desc
